name: Inventory Management System
description: Utilzing cameras, barcode scanners, and and webapp to make inventory management easier.

name: F16 WAF (Wing Attach Fitting) Removal Tool
description: F-16 wings are held onto the aircraft with WAF mounts. These mounts are extremely hard to remove for repair of fuel leaks, and can take in the neighborhood of 2-4 hrs to remove. Project Arc team members have fabricated a steel removal tool that utilizes 3D printed rubberized covers to be a buffer zone so that the steel tool does not touch the finger brace and cause damage. Now a task that once took 4 hours takes 10 mins.

name: Aegis Online Recall Roster
description: Using progressive web app technology to modernize recall roster management, and even recalls themselves.

name: LCTE Remote Control
description: Enabling remote capabilities via mesh radio systems in order to configure and control low cost threat emitters (LCTE).

name: LCTE Power Solution
description: Current power solution for LCTE is small gas generators, this solution requires a man in the loop for each LCTE which allows for a 12 hour run time. With the utilization of a Solar generator and Smart propane generator, now a LCTE can be left on and unmanned for 6 days before losing power.

name: Guillotine Pylon Rack
description: This idea behind the racking system is to lower the floor space footprint at Luke AFB AME (Aircraft Munitions Equipment) storage warehouse.  The Guillotine Pylon Rack is a modular system which can lower the floor space footprint by 85%. The rack saves on loading and unloading time utilizing overhead crane systems by 50%.

name: DCP Automation
description: Using Lieca Disto 7100i and a platform agnostic progressive web app to automatically record, analyze, and share DCP tests.

name: Mobile Datacenter
description: Assembling 2 small form factor PCs (SFFPC), 2 single board computers (SBC), and networking equipment into a single briefcase and preconfiguring with a series of applicaitons for DevSecOps, automation, data science, and AI/ML.

name: Project Arc Website
description: This website brought to you by viewers like you.
